opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Nebraska Cattlemen, Inc. v. Livestock Marketing Assn.

opinion:
541 U.S. 1062

NEBRASKA CATTLEMEN, INC., ET AL.
v.
LIVESTOCK MARKETING ASSN. ET AL.

No. 03-1165.

Supreme Court of United States.

May 24, 2004.

1

C. A. 8th Cir. Motion of 48 Cattle and Agricultural Associations for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae in No. 03-1164 granted. Certiorari granted limited to Question 1 presented by each petition. Cases consolidated, and a total of one hour allotted for oral argument. Reported below: 335 F. 3d 711.
